com.brightcove.vmap

Class VMAPComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.event.AbstractComponent
      • com.brightcove.vmap.VMAPComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    @Emits(events={"completed","error","pause","play","willInterruptContent","willResumeContent","registerPlugin","setCuePoint","vmapInitialized"})
@ListensFor(events={"activityCreated","activityPaused","activityResumed","activitySaveInstanceState","activityStarted","activityStopped","completed","cuePoint","didInterruptContent","fragmentCreatedView","fragmentPaused","fragmentResumed","fragmentSaveInstanceState","fragmentStarted","fragmentStopped","play","progress","seekTo","setVideo","willChangeVideo","vmapInitialized","videoAdCompleted","videoAdLearnMore","videoAdPlaybackError","videoAdProgress","videoAdPause","videoAdResume","videoAdSkip"})
public class VMAPComponent
extends AbstractComponent
    Component for rendering VMAP ads from a non-Google DoubleClick For Publishers server. For rendering ads from DoubleClick servers, the GoogleIMAComponent is recommended.
